item.description:
Dear Westborough Spirituality Meetup members,

How are you?

We have later April shower in May. Hope it brings up more flowers. Last month, we had a great meetup. Thank Beth Celine  and Peter who shares a lot insight. This month we like to invite you all to get together to share more and brings up peace for world.

Join me for this discussion and we can take a little walk after discussion, If the weather is nice.

Thank you

 

Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: 147 will be the second building on your ride when you drive into Calton Gardens
item.name: Westborough Spirituality May meetup
